core/amp/common/header:
{{#if banners.top}}
{{{limit banners.top 1}}}
{{/if}}
{{> core/amp/common/logo}}
{{#block 'amp-cart-icon'}}{{/block}}
{{> core/amp/common/navigation}}
core/amp/products/styles:
<style amp-custom>
  {{> core/amp/css/base
    header_background=header_background
    header_text=header_text
    body_background=body_background
    color_headings=color_headings
    color_text=color_text
    footer_background=footer_background
    footer_text=footer_text
    color_accent=color_accent
    color_borders=color_borders
  }}
  {{> core/amp/css/header
    header_background=header_background
    header_text=header_text
    body_background=body_background
    color_headings=color_headings
    color_text=color_text
    footer_background=footer_background
    footer_text=footer_text
    color_accent=color_accent
    color_borders=color_borders
  }}
  {{> core/amp/css/footer
    header_background=header_background
    header_text=header_text
    body_background=body_background
    color_headings=color_headings
    color_text=color_text
    footer_background=footer_background
    footer_text=footer_text
    color_accent=color_accent
    color_borders=color_borders
  }}
  {{> core/amp/css/product
    color_headings=color_headings
    color_text=color_text
    color_accent=color_accent
    color_borders=color_borders
  }}
</style>
core/amp/common/logo:
{{#if settings.store_logo.image}}
{{else}} {{settings.store_logo.title}} {{/if}}
core/amp/common/navigation:
{{#each categories}}
  • {{> core/amp/common/navigation-loop show_all=true }}
    • {{/each}}
    {{#each pages}}
  • {{> core/amp/common/navigation-loop show_all=false }}
    • {{/each}} {{#if settings.gift_certificates_enabled}}
  • {{lang 'core.amp.header.gift_certificate'}}
    • {{/if}}
    {{#if currency_selector.currencies.length '>' 1}}
    {{lang 'core.amp.header.currency' code=currency_selector.active_currency_code}}
      {{#each currency_selector.currencies}}
    • {{name}}
      • {{/each}}
    {{/if}} {{#if settings.account_creation_enabled}} {{#if customer}}
  • {{lang 'core.amp.header.account'}}
  • {{lang 'core.amp.header.logout'}}
    • {{#if customer.store_credit.value '>' 0}}
  • {{lang 'core.amp.header.store_credit' store_credit=customer.store_credit.formatted}}
    • {{/if}} {{else}}
  • {{lang 'core.amp.header.account'}}
    • {{/if}} {{/if}}
core/amp/products/product-images:
<section
  class="
    amp-product-images
    {{#unless product.images}}
      amp-no-product-images
    {{/unless}}
  "
  data-image-gallery
>
  {{#if product.images}}
   {{#if product.images.length}}
     <amp-carousel
       width="250"
       height="250"
       layout="responsive"
       autoplay
       loop
       delay="5000"
       type="slides"
     >
       {{#each product.images}}
         <amp-img
           class="amp-product-image"
           src="{{getImage this 'amp-product-image'}}"
           layout="fill"
           alt="{{this.alt}}"
         >
         </amp-img>
       {{/each}}
     </amp-carousel>
    {{/if}}
  {{else}}
    <amp-img
      class="amp-product-image amp-no-image"
      src="{{cdn theme_settings.default_image}}"
      layout="fill"
      alt="{{lang 'common.no_image'}}"
    >
    </amp-img>
  {{/if}}
</section>
core/amp/products/product-details:
{{#if product.price.saved}}
{{lang 'core.product.sale'}}
{{/if}}
{{#if settings.show_product_rating}} {{> core/amp/common/ratings rating=product.rating}} {{/if}} {{#if product.brand}} {{product.brand.name}} {{/if}}

{{product.title}}

{{> core/products/price retail_price_label=theme_settings.retail-price-label non_sale_price_label=theme_settings.non-sale-price-label sale_price_label=theme_settings.sale-price-label price_label=theme_settings.price-label price=product.price show_tax_labels=true price_range_display=theme_settings.price_range_display show_savings=true }}
{{#if product.call_for_price}}

{{product.call_for_price}}

{{/if}}
{{#block 'amp-additional-info'}}{{/block}}
core/amp/products/product-accordion:
{{#if product.description}}

{{lang 'core.amp.product.description'}}

{{{product.description}}}
{{/if}} {{#if product.videos.list.length}}

{{lang 'core.amp.product.videos'}}

{{> core/amp/products/videos product.videos }}
{{/if}} {{#if settings.show_product_reviews}} {{#if product.reviews.total}}

{{lang 'core.amp.product.reviews' num=product.reviews.total}}

{{> core/amp/products/reviews reviews=product.reviews product=product urls=urls }}
{{/if}} {{/if}} {{#if settings.add_this.buttons}}

{{lang 'core.amp.product.share'}}

{{> core/amp/common/share}}
{{/if}}
core/amp/products/product-form:
{{#if product.options}}
{{lang 'core.amp.product.choose_options'}}
{{else}} {{#if product.pre_order}} {{lang 'core.amp.product.pre_order'}} {{else}} {{lang 'core.amp.product.atc'}} {{/if}} {{/if}}
core/amp/common/ratings:
{{!-- Display rating as series of stars @param rating The Rating value to display. --}}
{{#for 1 5}} {{#if ../rating '>=' $index}} {{else}} {{/if}} {{/for}}
core/amp/products/reviews:
{{#each reviews.list}}
  • {{> core/amp/common/ratings rating=rating}}

    {{title}}

    {{#if name}}

    {{lang 'core.amp.product.reviews_post_on_by' date=date name=name}}

    {{/if}}

    {{nl2br text}}

    • {{/each}}
{{> core/amp/common/pagination pagination.reviews}}
core/amp/common/share:
{{#if settings.add_this.buttons}}
    {{#each settings.add_this.buttons}} {{#all (if service '!==' 'google') (if service '!==' 'print') (if service '!==' 'facebook') (if service '!==' 'facebook_like') }}
  • {{#if service '===' 'google_plusone'}} {{else}} {{/if}}
    • {{/all}} {{/each}}
{{/if}}
core/amp/products/videos:
{{#each this.list}}

{{title_long}}

{{description_short}}

{{/each}}
